name: Sibhatullah Amani
story: Sibhatullah Amani was born and raised in the Middle East. He has always had a fascination with military weaponry and tactics, and so he decided to join the armed forces when he turned 18. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his determination and skill, and now serves as an Asst. Autorifleman for the OPFOR faction in Arma 3. Despite his young age, Sibhatullah is a fierce fighter and a trusted member of his squad.
